lines.text: Maybe this bottle's expired? Guy got blood poisoning?
Wait, what? You're supposed to drink that stuff?!
Yeah, of course! Gotta keep your magical chakras all cleaned out with fresh blood, yeah?
If he got a hold of a tainted bottle, it could've been real bad.
All the magic energies would get twisted up inside his chest... and it'd explode all over yeah I'm just messing with you.
Don't play games with me, kid! I got a weak stomach!
